location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Stephen Babington, Secretary to Government at Bombay Castle, to Lieutanent William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting an extract of a letter sent on 19 November 1813 from Babington containing instructions that any of the Company's cruizers sailing to Bombay from the Gulf had to be available to convey Jaffer Ali Khan and his baggage to the Residency at Bombay, free of charge.
